titleStmt.title: Having taken speciall notice of the great service done to us in our absence from this city ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Oxford, by Leonard Lichfield ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 2 lines of text.
"Given at our court at Oxford, this fifth day of November, in the twentieth yeare of our reigne. 1644."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
